description.narrative: För att som en del av den strategiska omvandlingen av Hromadske Television säkerställa en kontinuerlig produktion av oberoende och pluralistiska nyheter och andra typer av programverksamhet, och expandera publik på olika plattformar innan kriterier för kärnstöd är uppfyllda.

To ensure continuous production of independent, pluralistic news and other types of programming, and expand audiences on various platforms, as part of strategic transformation of Hromadske Television, before the criteria for Core Support are fulfilled.

The development intervention's intended outcome is to support continuous production of independent, pluralistic news and other types of programming, and expand audiences on various platforms, as part of strategic transformation of Hromadske Television.

Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: As a result of this bridge-funding grant Project, the cooperation partner Hromadske TV continued its operation without interruption, being properly staffed and having sufficient resources. Another major output of the Preparatory suport Project was the development of a new Strategy for 2017-2018, paving the way for Hromadske TV to maximizing its impact and audience outreach and distribution. According to the Embassy monitoring observations, a 4-month process of in-depth stakeholder consultations and strategy development was as equally valuable to the organisation as the document developed as a result. The new Strategy became a realistic document owned by the organisation, a product of many discussions and compromises of the team, and a moving target actually used by the team. Hromadske TV also noted that when selecting a time-span, a conscious decision was made to limit it to two years, drawing on experience of digital media projects and other types of new enterprises. The previous experience with developing a strategy until 2020 (six years) was – according to the organisation – neither realistic nor helpful. It ended up to be an overly ambitious document. Hence, the current two-year Strategy was designed in a way that would enable scaling most of the activities into years three and four, if appropriate. This approach is more thoughful, realistic and is an important indicator of the organisation's growing maturity. Also, in the course of the Preparatory support Project 10661 DANIDA approached the Embassy with a proposal of delegated cooperation with Sweden via Nordic Plus modality for further support to Hromadske starting from the end of 2017. Danish MFA allocated additional grant support for this intervention. The joint financial arrangement was signed between Sida and Danida for this intervention covering 2017-2018. The Parties have committed themselves to the principles of harmonisation and the highest degree of alignment with the budgetary and follow up system of Hromadske TV so as to enhance effective implementation and to reduce the administrative burden on the Hromadske TV. Sida and Danida also agreed on common procedures for consultation and decision-making, monitoring and reporting, review and evaluation, audit, financial management and the exchange of information and cooperation for this intervention. This joint support can potentially strengthen the sustainability of Hromadske TV in mid-term perspective.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
